com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.ui.v5.instruction

Class ImageCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.ui.v5.instruction.ImageCreator

  • public class ImageCreator
extends Object
    Utility class that can be used to load a given BannerText into the provided TextView.

    For each BannerComponents, either the text or given shield URL will be used (the shield URL taking priority).

    If a shield URL is found, Picasso is used to load the image. Then, once the image is loaded, a new ImageSpan is created and set to the appropriate position of the Spannable

      • initialize

        public void initialize(Context context)
        Must be called before loading images.

        Initializes a new Picasso instance as well as the ArrayList of InstructionTarget.

        Parameters:

      • prefetchImageCache

        public void prefetchImageCache(com.mapbox.api.directions.v5.models.LegStep legStep)
        Will pre-fetch images for a given LegStep.

        If loaded successfully, this will allow the images to be displayed without delay in the InstructionView.

        Parameters:
        legStep - providing the image Urls
